EmailTemplate.subject: Diabetes management vs reversal: what's the right approach?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
March 2023
Partner Essentials
Decoding the promises of diabetes management programs With the overwhelming financial burden of diabetes on the country—$327 billion annually1—it's understandably tempting when a vendor promises diabetes “reversal.” It's important, however, to be cautious of companies that make claims not approved by the medical community.
Check out our employer guide to diabetes management, which outlines the critical questions to ask when looking for the right solution for your organization.
Learn more <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/resources/brochure/employers-guide-diabetes-management-vs-reversal/?&utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_content=diabetes-management-vs-reversal&utm_term=tpa&utm_campaign=march-partner-essentials&utm_campaign_id=]]>
